org.jsmsengine
Class CStatusReportMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.jsmsengine.CMessage
      org.jsmsengine.CIncomingMessage
          org.jsmsengine.CStatusReportMessage

public class CStatusReportMessage
extends CIncomingMessage

This class represents a Status Report SMS message. In order to request a Status Report, use the setStatusReport() function of the outgoing message. Then, expect to eventually receive an IncomingMessage message of class CStatusReportMessage() (i.e. with type == TYPE_STATUS_REPORT).

Valid fields are:
recipient: the recipient of the original message.
text: a message reading the status of the delivery.

See Also:
CMessage, COutgoingMessage, COutgoingMessage.setStatusReport(boolean), CIncomingMessage, CService.readMessages(LinkedList, int)
